F.title: Rats!
F.text: Get rid of the rats from someone's basement.

F.title: Big pile of rubble
F.text: Tavern collapsed. Again. Help clean up the debris.

E.title: Phantom menace
E.text: Exorcise ghosts out of someone's apartment.

E.title: Scratchy in peril
E.text: Get Scratchy the cat from the tree safe onto the ground.

D.title: Rare ore
D.text: Obtain laudanium ore for town's blacksmith.

D.title: Demonic pests!
D.text: Clear the fields from cabbage imps.

C.title: Scratchy, the butcher
C.text: Scratchy turned evil and is terrorizing its victims. Put a stop to it!

C.title: Hobgnoblin subjegation
C.text: Gnoblins evolved and are back for vengeance.

C.title: Holy
C.text: Gnoblins summoned their machine god and it started going haywire on everything around it. Destroy it!

B.title: Undead horde
B.text: Due to the spillage of necromancy potion at nearby graveyard we now have an undead army on our doorstep.

B.title: Runaway prisoner
B.text: During the last prison guard strike a prisoner managed to escape. Bring them back to their cell.

B.title: The aristocrats
B.text: Royalty wants an escort for one of their carriages.

A.title: Ogre king
A.text: Ogres have chosen a new king through democratic vote. They all voted for the strongest ogre.

A.title: Devilish dungeon
A.text: New dungeon was discovered. It needs to be mapped and explored so lower rank adventurers can enter.

A.title: Eater of Worlds
A.text: A giant worm emerged from the ground and appears to be consuming the ground itself.

S.title: The Demon King
S.text: Demon King has awoken and is a threat to whole existence. Heroes needed.

S.title: Scratchy, Destruction Incarnate
S.text: Scratchy was reborn as a machine of pure destruction and needs to be stopped.

S.title: Jiggly Jungle
S.text: A jungle south began rapidly expanding and experts think arson is our only option.
